attributes.action: Uphold the results of the UK EU referendum on 23 June and invoke Article 50.
attributes.additional_details:
Uk has held numerous elections and even low percentage turnout figures, the majority percentage or the age of voters has never been a deciding factor in whether the vote was upheld.
Given previous election results most would have been declared null and void on percentages.
attributes.background: The government of the UK held a national referendum in which citizens of the UK were asked to vote on whether the UK should remain or leave the EU. A majority of the vote was for the UK to leave the EU and this result should be upheld resulting in Article 50 being invoked as soon ss possible.
